attributes.action: Ban the sale and use of fireworks by the general public.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence can be found in the outrageous statistics of children injured/burnt who will be at A & E as we speak.
attributes.background:
Children burnt in A & E departments all over the UK and animals injured or frightened to death all over the UK is unacceptable. 

It's 2017 and celebrating a failed terrorist is not a message we as the population should be passing to our children. 

Licenced firework displays should be enough.
